QUICK_SETUP.INTERNET_CONNECTION_TYPE_NOTE: If you are not sure about which Internet Connection Type you have, use Auto Detect or contact your Internet Service Provider (ISP) for assistance.
QUICK_SETUP.DYNAMIC_IP_INFO: If your ISP only allows Internet access to a specific MAC Address, you need to clone the MAC Address of the primary computer. If you are not sure, select Do NOT Clone MAC Address.
QUICK_SETUP.MAC_CLONE_NOTE: If you select Use Custom MAC Address, you need to enter the MAC address of the computer that is registered with your ISP.
QUICK_SETUP.PPPOE_INFO: Please enter your PPPoE username and password.
QUICK_SETUP.EMPTY_INFO: The username and password are empty, are you sure you want to continue?

QUICK_SETUP.EMPTY_PASSWORD: The password is empty, are you sure you want to continue?
QUICK_SETUP.L2TP_INFO: Please enter your L2TP username and password.
QUICK_SETUP.PPTP_INFO: Please enter your PPTP username and password.
QUICK_SETUP.WIRELESS_BOTH_DISABLE: Your device will be disconnected if both bands are disabled.
QUICK_SETUP.SUMMARY_INFO1:
Saving...
Your wireless settings will be changed, please reconnect to the new SSID before tapping Next.
QUICK_SETUP.RECONNECT_NOTE: Sorry. Your wireless connection is lost, please reconnect, and then tap OK.
QUICK_SETUP.TEST_INTERNET_SUCCESS_INFO: Tap Finish to end the Quick Setup process.
QUICK_SETUP.TEST_INTERNET_FAILED_INFO_0: Please verify your settings or reboot your modem, then test your Internet connection again. If you are not using a modem, please contact your service provider for assistance.
QUICK_SETUP.COMPLETE_INFO: You have completed the Quick Setup process. Tap the button below to test your Internet connection, then tap Finish.

WIRELESS.PUSH_DES: You can connect to any WPS-enabled device to your router by tapping the WPS button above or pressing the physical WPS button on the router.
WIRELESS.ROUTERS_PIN_INFO: Enter the router’s PIN on your wireless client to connect it to the router.
WIRELESS.CLIENT_PIN_DES: Enter the wireless client's WPS PIN to connect it to the router.
WIRELESS.WIRELESS_TURN_ON_INFO: To connect using WPS, please turn on the wireless function.
WIRELESS.WIRELESS_TURN_OFF_INFO: Your wireless function is off. If you want to use this function, please switch ON the wireless Wi-Fi button.
WIRELESS.WIRELESS_PARAMETERS_INFO: To use WPS Wizard, you should configure the right wireless parameters first.
WIRELESS.WIRELESS_SAVE_NOTE: Wireless network has changed, please reconnect.

GUEST_SETTINGS.ALLOW_EACH: Allow Guests to Access Each Other
GUEST_SETTINGS.ALLOW_LOCAL: Allow guests to access my local network
GUEST_SETTINGS.GUEST_SAVE_NOTE: Wireless network will reboot to make your settings take effect, please reconnect.
GUEST_SETTINGS.SHARE_PASSWORD: All guest networks share the same password. Any changes made to the password of one band will be applied to the other band(s)

USB.TITLE: USB Settings
USB.AC_NOTE: You can use the default login account or create a new account to access the shared contents.
USB.ACCESS_NOTE: Access with sharing account username and password.
USB.NOTE1: Install the printer driver on your computer.
USB.NOTE2: Connect the USB printer to the USB port of the router via a USB cable.
USB.NOTE3: Install the TP-Link USB Printer Controller Utility. Please download it from our official website: http://www.tp-link.com/en/Support/.
